course_title: Professionalism and Law in Civil Engineering

sections.comments: If you are unable to register in the course, please send an e-mail to the instructor at isaacson@apsc.ubc.ca, indicating the reason that you are unable to register.  Please provide your student number, your program details (university, program name, year level), a copy of your transcript to date, an indication of how you have met course prerequisites, and a rationale for your need to take the course.

description: The Engineers and Geoscientists Act; professional ethics, conflicts of interest, confidentiality and accountability; health and safety; sustainable development and environmental stewardship; equity considerations; design and construction contracts, specifications and tendering; labour and employment law; dispute resolution; evidence and expert witnesses; torts and legal liability.
